extension.name: Field: Geocoding
extension.description: Populates fields with geocoding information using the combined values of other fields.

releases.release: - PHP 7 Support - Symphony 2.7 compatibility - Add Google Maps API Key to configuration - Code cleanup
- Updated field label to follow Symphony core field structure by using label element instead of p element.
- Symphony 2.3 compatibility - Show map of location in entry table and publish panel - Add distance to datasource XML output when the field is used as a filter
